verses.verse: וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> become צַעֲקַ֥ת <WH6818> cry הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> of the people וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH802> and of their wives גְּדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> And there was a great אֶל־ <WH413> against אֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> against their brethren הַיְּהוּדִֽים׃ <WH3064> the Jews

וְיֵשׁ֙ <WH3426> For there were אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אֹמְרִ֔ים <WH559> that said בָּנֵ֥ינוּ <WH1121> We our sons וּבְנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1323> and our daughters אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> [are] many וְנִקְחָ֥ה <WH3947> therefore we take up דָגָ֖ן <WH1715> corn וְנֹאכְלָ֥ה <WH398> [for them] that we may eat וְנִחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> and live

וְיֵשׁ֙ <WH3426> [Some] also there were אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אֹמְרִ֔ים <WH559> that said שְׂדֹתֵ֛ינוּ <WH7704> our lands וּכְרָמֵ֥ינוּ <WH3754> vineyards וּבָתֵּ֖ינוּ <WH1004> and houses אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we עֹרְבִ֑ים <WH6148> We have mortgaged וְנִקְחָ֥ה <WH3947> that we might buy דָגָ֖ן <WH1715> corn בָּרָעָֽב׃ <WH7458> because of the dearth

וְיֵשׁ֙ <WH3426> There were אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אֹמְרִ֔ים <WH559> also that said לָוִ֥ינוּ <WH3867> We have borrowed כֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> money לְמִדַּ֣ת <WH4060> tribute הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> for the king's שְׂדֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH7704> [and that upon] our lands וּכְרָמֵֽינוּ׃ <WH3754> and vineyards

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now כִּבְשַׂ֤ר <WH1320> Yet now our flesh אַחֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH251> of our brethren בְּשָׂרֵ֔נוּ <WH1320> [is] as the flesh כִּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> our children בָּנֵ֑ינוּ <WH1121> as their children וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we כֹ֠בְשִׁים <WH3533> and lo we bring into bondage אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנֵ֨ינוּ <WH1121> our sons וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתֵ֜ינוּ <WH1323> and our daughters לַעֲבָדִ֗ים <WH5650> to be servants וְיֵ֨שׁ <WH3426> are מִבְּנֹתֵ֤ינוּ <WH1323> and [some] of our daughters נִכְבָּשׁוֹת֙ <WH3533> brought unto bondage וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> else לְאֵ֣ל <WH410> God יָדֵ֔נוּ <WH3027> because וּשְׂדֹתֵ֥ינוּ <WH7704> have our lands וּכְרָמֵ֖ינוּ <WH3754> and vineyards לַאֲחֵרִֽים׃ <WH312> [to redeem them] for other men

וַיִּ֥חַר <WH2734> angry לִ֖י מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> And I was very כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> I שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH8085> when I heard אֶת־ <WH853> זַֽעֲקָתָ֔ם <WH2201> their cry וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> and these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> and these

וַיִּמָּלֵ֨ךְ <WH4427> Then I consulted לִבִּ֜י <WH3820> with myself עָלַ֗י <WH5921> against וָאָרִ֙יבָה֙ <WH7378> and I rebuked אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֹרִ֣ים <WH2715> the nobles וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַסְּגָנִ֔ים <WH5461> and the rulers וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <WH559> and said לָהֶ֔ם מַשָּׁ֥א <WH5378> debt אִישׁ־ <WH376> every one בְּאָחִ֖יו <WH251> of his brother אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you נֹשִׁ֑אים <WH5383> creditor וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> And I set עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> against קְהִלָּ֥ה <WH6952> assembly גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> a great

וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <WH559> And I said לָהֶ֗ם אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we קָ֠נִינוּ <WH7069> have redeemed אֶת־ <WH853> אַחֵ֨ינוּ <WH251> our brethren הַיְּהוּדִ֜ים <WH3064> the Jews הַנִּמְכָּרִ֤ים <WH4376> which were sold לַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> unto the heathen כְּדֵ֣י <WH1767> unto them We after our ability בָ֔נוּ וְגַם־ <WH1571> even אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> you תִּמְכְּר֥וּ <WH4376> and will ye even sell אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחֵיכֶ֖ם <WH251> your brothers וְנִמְכְּרוּ־ <WH4376> may be sold לָ֑נוּ וַֽיַּחֲרִ֔ישׁוּ <WH2790> unto us? Then held they their peace וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not מָצְא֖וּ <WH4672> and found דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1696> answer ס

[וַיֹּאמֶר כ] (וָאֹומַ֕ר <WH559> answer ק) לֹא־ <WH3808> is not ט֥וֹב <WH2896> It [is] not good הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> that אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you עֹשִׂ֑ים <WH6213> ye do הֲל֞וֹא <WH3808> not בְּיִרְאַ֤ת <WH3374> in the fear אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> of our God תֵּלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> walk מֵחֶרְפַּ֖ת <WH2781> because of the reproach הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> of the heathen אוֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <WH341> our enemies

וְגַם־ <WH1571> and likewise אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אַחַ֣י <WH251> I likewise [and] my brethren וּנְעָרַ֔י <WH5288> and my servants נֹשִׁ֥ים <WH5383> might exact בָּהֶ֖ם כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> of them money וְדָגָ֑ן <WH1715> and corn נַֽעַזְבָה־ <WH5800> I pray you let us leave off נָּ֖א <WH4994> Please אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּשָּׁ֥א <WH4855> this usury הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

הָשִׁיבוּ֩ <WH7725> Restore נָ֨א <WH4994> Please לָהֶ֜ם כְּהַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> I pray you to them even this day שְׂדֹתֵיהֶ֛ם <WH7704> their lands כַּרְמֵיהֶ֥ם <WH3754> their vineyards זֵיתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2132> their oliveyards וּבָתֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH1004> and their houses וּמְאַ֨ת <WH3967> also the hundredth הַכֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> [part] of the money וְהַדָּגָן֙ <WH1715> and of the corn הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <WH8492> the wine וְהַיִּצְהָ֔ר <WH3323> and the oil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you נֹשִׁ֥ים <WH5383> that ye exact בָּהֶֽם׃

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> Then said נָשִׁ֗יב <WH7725> they We will restore וּמֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> like לֹ֣א <WH3808> nothing נְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <WH1245> [them] and will require כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> exactly נַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> nothing of them so will we do כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you אוֹמֵ֑ר <WH559> as thou sayest וָאֶקְרָא֙ <WH7121> Then I called אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> the priests וָֽאַשְׁבִּיעֵ֔ם <WH7650> and took an oath לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> of them that they should do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> according to this promise הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

גַּם־ <WH1571> also חָצְנִ֣י <WH2684> my lap נָעַ֗רְתִּי <WH5287> Also I shook וָֽאֹמְרָ֡ה <WH559> and said כָּ֣כָה <WH3602> Thus יְנַעֵ֪ר <WH5287> shake out הָֽאֱלֹהִ֟ים <WH430> So God אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every הָאִישׁ֩ <WH376> every man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יָקִ֜ים <WH6965> that performeth אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> not this promise הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this מִבֵּיתוֹ֙ <WH1004> from his house וּמִ֣יגִיע֔וֹ <WH3018> and from his labour וְכָ֛כָה <WH3602> thus יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become נָע֖וּר <WH5287> even thus be he shaken out וָרֵ֑ק <WH7386> and emptied וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> said כָֽל־ <WH3605> and all הַקָּהָ֜ל <WH6951> And all the congregation אָמֵ֗ן <WH543> Amen וַֽיְהַלְלוּ֙ <WH1984> and praised אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> did הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And the people כַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> according to this promise הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

גַּ֞ם <WH1571> Moreover מִיּ֣וֹם ׀ <WH3117> Moreover from the time אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> i צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> that I was appointed אֹתִ֗י <WH853> לִהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> become פֶּחָם֮ <WH6346> to be their governor בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land יְהוּדָה֒ <WH3063> of Judah מִשְּׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year עֶשְׂרִ֗ים <WH6242> from the twentieth וְ֠עַד <WH5704> against שְׁנַ֨ת <WH8141> year שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <WH7970> and thirtieth וּשְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> even unto the two לְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֣סְתְּא <WH783> of Artaxerxes הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years שְׁתֵּ֣ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֑ה <WH6240> ten אֲנִ֣י <WH589> my וְאַחַ֔י <WH251> I and my brethren לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> the bread הַפֶּ֖חָה <WH6346> of the governor לֹ֥א <WH3808> neither אָכַֽלְתִּי׃ <WH398> have not eaten

וְהַפַּחוֹת֩ <WH6346> governors הָרִאשֹׁנִ֨ים <WH7223> But the former אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who לְפָנַ֜י <WH6440> that [had been] before הִכְבִּ֣ידוּ <WH3513> me were chargeable עַל־ <WH5921> on הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> unto the people וַיִּקְח֨וּ <WH3947> and had taken מֵהֶ֜ם <WH1992> them בְּלֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> of them bread וָיַ֙יִן֙ <WH3196> and wine אַחַר֙ <WH310> beside כֶּֽסֶף־ <WH3701> of silver שְׁקָלִ֣ים <WH8255> shekels אַרְבָּעִ֔ים <WH705> forty גַּ֥ם <WH1571> yea even נַעֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5288> their servants שָׁלְט֣וּ <WH7980> bare rule עַל־ <WH5921> and הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> over the people וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I לֹא־ <WH3808> did not עָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> but so did כֵ֔ן <WH3651> so מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> not I because יִרְאַ֥ת <WH3374> of the fear אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וְ֠גַם <WH1571> also בִּמְלֶ֜אכֶת <WH4399> in the work הַחוֹמָ֤ה <WH2346> of this wall הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> likewise הֶחֱזַ֔קְתִּי <WH2388> Yea also I continued וְשָׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> we any land לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not קָנִ֑ינוּ <WH7069> neither bought וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all נְעָרַ֔י <WH5288> and all my servants קְבוּצִ֥ים <WH6908> [were] gathered שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there עַל־ <WH5921> for הַמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> thither unto the work

וְהַיְּהוּדִ֨ים <WH3064> of the Jews וְהַסְּגָנִ֜ים <WH5461> and rulers מֵאָ֧ה <WH3967> an hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> besides וְהַבָּאִ֥ים <WH935> beside those that came אֵלֵ֛ינוּ <WH413> about מִן־ <WH4480> from הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> unto us from among the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> were סְבִיבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH5439> that [are] about us עַל־ <WH5921> at שֻׁלְחָנִֽי׃ <WH7979> Moreover [there were] at my table

וַאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become נַעֲשֶׂ֜ה <WH6213> Now [that] which was prepared לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> [for me] daily אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> [was] one שׁ֣וֹר <WH7794> ox אֶחָ֞ד <WH259> was one צֹ֠אן <WH6629> sheep שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> [and] six בְּרֻר֤וֹת <WH1305> choice וְצִפֳּרִים֙ <WH6833> also fowls נַֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> were prepared לִ֔י וּבֵ֨ין <WH996> and once עֲשֶׂ֧רֶת <WH6235> for me and once in ten יָמִ֛ים <WH3117> days בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all יַ֖יִן <WH3196> of all sorts of wine לְהַרְבֵּ֑ה <WH7235> store וְעִם־ <WH5973> yet for all זֶ֗ה <WH2088> this לֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> not I the bread הַפֶּחָה֙ <WH6346> of the governor לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not בִקַּ֔שְׁתִּי <WH1245> this required כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because כָֽבְדָ֥ה <WH3513> was heavy הָעֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> because the bondage עַל־ <WH5921> and הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> upon this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

זָכְרָה־ <WH2142> Think לִּ֥י אֱלֹהַ֖י <WH430> upon me my God לְטוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> for good כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> i עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> [according] to all that I have done עַל־ <WH5921> and הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> for this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this פ
